product_name: CytoSport Cytomax Sports Performance Drink Mix - 27 Serving
long_description: CytoSport Cytomax Sports Performance drink mix in powder form contains a blend of complex carbohydrates and sugars that work to sustain energy so you can train harder and longer. Contains alpha-L-Polylactact(TM), an exclusive energy source that can help provide energy while lowering acid in the muscles to prevent cramping. Drink mix helps restore electrolytes lost during exercise. Low-sodium, no-sucrose formula; CytoSport Cytomax Sports Performance drink mix contains stevia, a natural sweetener. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: CytoSport Cytomax Sports Performance drink mix in powder form contains a blend of complex carbohydrates and sugars that work to sustain energy so you can train harder and longer.
